newsitem.title: GREECE: Greek April private construction rises 13.4pct y/y.
newsitem.headline: Greek April private construction rises 13.4pct y/y.

text.p: Greece's index of private construction activity measured by the construction volume based on the number of building permits issued rose 13.4 percent year-on-year in April, the National Statistics Service (NSS) said.
"In April construction volume based on the number of building permits nationwide reached 4.992 million cubic metres against 4.404 million in April 1996, an increase of 13.4 percent," NSS said.
In the first four months of the year, private construction activity was up 4.7 percent compared to the same period a year ago. Activity in the Attica region was slightly up 0.1 percent, it added.
